content.detailedDescription:
At approx. 10:30-11pm. while laying down relaxing, i was just looking out of my 4th floor large bay window & skylight that overlooks lake erie, i suddenly saw reddish glowing circular objects approaching from the west in pairs of two's and four's. they appeared to fly around in unison, in a geometric formation of sorts. during the twenty minutes i watched, it was as though an entire linear formation of these "entities or flying objects", cruised by the lake front and seemed to be flying somewhere between, as low as 1,000 feet above the lake, to as high as 3,000 feet as they departed moving northward out over the lake. i opened my window to see if i could hear an engine or any sound and there was absolute silence in the sky during the time the objects were visible. i filed a report shortly after my sighting last night which contained the basic documentation above, but upon reflection today, and following the suggestions on this site, i want to note the following additional recollections:
1.) at first i tried to convince myself that what i was witnessing might just be thai balloons. but  of course, because they moved so deliberately fast and always in some sort of formation, and were able to almost instantly fly toward the horizon, i knew they were nothing i could rationalize as a known object. 
2.) it was nearly impossible using my iphone and ipad to capture the intensity, or the scale, or the color, the energy emitted or the trajectory of their movement. all approximately 12-14 of them flew in sequentially from the west, high over the treetops traveling very fast until they came into view above my skylight. then each one seemed to slow down and move out maybe a half mile or so over the lake and hover. they all hovered in groups of two and then another object would arrive always forming triangles. other formations were clearly geometric and involved five objects. these "formations" would hover within eyesight for a minute or so and then fly off over the lake in the direction of canada. i've provided photos of these formations.
3.)i quickly realized that i was experiencing something remarkable due to how close and repetitive these flying objects were. i began counting them and trying really hard to photograph and video them but nothing i captured, in any way reflects their intensity--and the red-orange glow that enveloped each one. when i reviewed my photos, i found one picture of a bright green streak. that was a photo i took trying to capture one of the objects flying away like lightening toward the horizon. apparently, my photo just caught the energy the object emitted.
4.) after somewhere between 20-30 minutes, the formations of flying, glowing bright reddish-orange orbs or objects simply ceased coming into view. the last formation consisted of the bright green streak i described as the only image i caught of the object hovering for minutes, then finally--instantly, speeding away. the only words i can use to describe the entire experience were, exciting, amazing and unbelievable.
content.summary: On july 5, 2014 i observed and tried to document a 20+ minute unidentified flying object experience that was magnificent.

content.detailedDescription: Left the house to go to call my brother who was a friend was autumn at 18:00 19:00 100 meters out of the house i find myself in the middle of the road in the country also my eyes and see an object hidden by gray clouds with two lights under the headlights type disc around and i could see the lights that revolved around the edge of the hard disk very fine type of color electric purple yellow red eye contact i think maybe 30 seconds at the moment let us pass a guy to call to get it to see the 'object but at that time the object as part of a splinter north to altisima speed arivato on a nearby motel a few miles disappears leaving a z-shaped light emitting just no sound
content.summary: apparently a disc with colored lights that ran around and under imerso two lights in the clouds

content.detailedDescription: While sitting outside watching fireworks from around the neighborhood at around 11:10pm,my wife spotted what she thought was part of an exploded firework coming our direction from the se. when she made the comment i turned to look and we then saw it wasn't a firework but a very bright somewhat large, triangle shaped craft of some sort coming over the highway and flying a straight path about 500 feet to the ne of our position and about the same distance in elevation. it seemed to fly right over the trees heading towards the nw. it made no sound at all and had no flashing lights such as those on an aircraft. the moon was about 1/3 full and this thing was brighter than the moon by far, as it gave off an intense red/orange to yellow/orange glow! it somewhat looked like fire, but steady and contained. the craft being triangle shaped, looked exactly like a pyramid turned on its side,point towards the nw, base to the se. it flew a straight line path in my view as far as i could see heading nw. my wife had went to get my binoculars and she picked it up and watched as it flew the same general path, then she said it had deviated, or turned more towards the west before she lost sight of it! not sure about airspeed of the object, but in ground speed it seemed to be doing 40-50 mph. it was large and it was bright! most assuredly the best light we saw in the sky this 4th, of july night! tried calling tinker air force base and the local airport for radar sighting but could not get a number from information listed to contact the appropriate personnel. made a report to the police station instead!
content.summary: Ufo triangle on 4th.Of july, 2014

content.detailedDescription: I was in a car, on the way to villa rica from dallas and in the sky me and my family repetitively saw a black triangle with 3 white lights in the sky at this time it made no noise. it flew in a medium sized circular path for around 25 minutes. when we got home we looked into the sky and spotted it hovering for a minute and then it quickly started flying away at that point i had my phone out and took 3 pictures one with flash on. after that it flew beyond my sight.
content.summary: Black triangle with 3 white lights hovered and flew at varied speeds

content.detailedDescription: My young daughter and i came out of our home to drive to the local supermarket. i have a tendency to always lookup at the sky. today i noticed a jet aircraft  heading towards the north, it was then that i watched the ufo which was at i higher altitude heading nw. it moved very fast at a high altitude, faster than a fighter jet. sadly i never had a chance to record this on my phone. i'm a great believer in ufos since i was a child growing up in salisbury rhodesia where my father older brother and i would see these objects very frequently
content.summary: This object was not a airplane i have seen many of these ufos over the years.

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 930 ish on july 4 th me and a friend of mine were lighting
off fireworks when i first noticed them in the nw sky. they kinda hovered there for a brief second but then started slowly flying to the sw. flight lasted around 3 min until they vanished in front of our eyes. these were not chinese lanterns or fireworks. i live close to the airport and it was not a plain,  i've seen this object before about a year or so ago, but was only one object, not two like i seen the other night.
content.summary: 2 orange red circles during fire works nw to sw

content.detailedDescription: I was at my house, and i've been sleeping in my bed. my friend was sleeping over at this time, but i know it wasn't her, because shes really short, and this "alien" was really tall and super slim. which no one in the house was this skinny. i had my phone off at the moment, but when i woke up to turn to change my position, it was on, and the light that was coming from it, gave me enough light to see this thing. it was really tall, about 6 to 7 ft. which no one is around this height in my house. it had a weird looking head, sort of bigger than a humans but not overly sized. its face looked scrunched up, with its forehead covering its eyes. i saw that it had very long arms, that was about 11inches away from touching the ground. its fingers were 5 inches away from touching the ground. its fingers were the size of a banana (approximately 6 inches)and the tips of them, looked like claws. very very sharp. during this sighting, i felt fear. its like fear took over my whole being. we stared at each other for what seemed to be a couple of minutes, but when i looked at the clock, its only been a few seconds. a couple of weeks, after this incident, i got severe depression, blocking out everything. i think i scared it off, because when i woke up i jumped a little and stared at it, then it went away. in the morning of this incident one of my hair extensions were gone. i think it thought that it was my hair to do some testing on. i don't know what it wanted to do with me. i feel like it wanted to abduct me, but i woke up, and it didn't want to take me when i was awake so they took my hair extensions instead. i would really like an explanation to why it was in my room, and what it wanted with me. i still feel like this sighting of the alien is the cause of my depression.
content.summary: Tall (6-7ft), slim, have very long arms and fingers, wasnt human shape

content.detailedDescription: I was watching fireworks over a nearby elementary school when i looked higher up in the sky and noticed an orangish red circle moving across the sky in a straight line. the circle was definitely not blinking as a plane's lights would. it was unwavering and steady, as was it's path and speed. i watched the object as far as i could see, and once it faded away, another appeared in the same manner. there was a total of four in this exact path, then i noticed one past a grouping of trees a little further away, but still appeared to be the same type object, color, speed, everything. i looked forward to viewing fireworks that night because i knew there was a chance i might get to see something other than the obvious, i was excited i actually got to see something. i didn't feel much past the excitement of the sighting. i only lost sight of the circles when they traveled too far away.
content.summary: Sighting during fireworks display

content.detailedDescription: At 9:18 pdt twenty people on my street noticed a red glowing object by the moon.I along with the others watched through binoculars as it zig zagged and came to a complete stop.It hovered in that spot for what seemed about thirty min.Then it left in a straight path to the southwest until it was out of sight. the second sighting was approx. 20 mins later when a dull white glowing object streaked eastward toward the cascade mts. it was moving very fast. i was able to get an approx. speed,because it was followed by a muli-prop plane moving at a slower rate. the object appeared to be moving approx. 400 mph. i also noticed it didn't have any port and starboard lights like the plane and it was too low to be a satellite. it appeared to be the same elevation as the plane,approx.1000 ft.The plane wasn't that high as it had just taken off from a local airport so it was easy to gauge elevation.
content.summary: Red light zig zagging by moon. then a second white ball of light streaking east followed by plane

content.detailedDescription:
Standing in my font yard looking at some neighbors fireworks, i noticed what looked like plane coming towards me above the roof lines. the object had a bright blue glow much deeper than air plane running lights. the color did not flash like normal running lights. it did fade and change to bright red. the object flew in irragular patterns like figure 8's, circles and straight lines, it was not normal at all, so i ran in to get my wife, she came out and saw the object. i went in to get my cell phone to try and get a video, but by the time i came back for second time it had started moving away and disappeared below the roof line. the whole event took about 10 minutes.
when the object was changing direction it also changed colors and speed. the speed at times seemed extream. if it was a drone of some kind it was far away as we heard no noise. also being so far away the change in its possition in the sky was extreamly fast at times. 

very strange object.
content.summary: Flying object with changes in color flying irregular patterns

content.detailedDescription:
Standing in my font yard looking at some neighbors fireworks, i noticed what looked like plane coming towards me above the roof lines. the object had a bright blue glow much deeper than air plane running lights. the color did not flash like normal running lights. it did fade and change to bright red. the object flew in irragular patterns like figure 8's, circles and straight lines, it was not normal at all, so i ran in to get my wife, she came out and saw the object. i went in to get my cell phone to try and get a video, but by the time i came back for second time it had started moving away and disappeared below the roof line. the whole event took about 10 minutes.
when the object was changing direction it also changed colors and speed. the speed at times seemed extream. if it was a drone of some kind it was far away as we heard no noise. also being so far away the change in its possition in the sky was extreamly fast at times. 

very strange object.
content.summary: Flying object with changes in color flying irregular patterns

content.detailedDescription:
We were near sonoma square waiting with several thousand people for the 9:30 fireworks.
several minutes before the fireworks started, a kid pointed straight up with his arm and said something like "hey, a blue ufo!"
most people who heard him (he yelled pretty loud) looked up and we saw a small, far away group of 6-10 faint starlike objects. the group was traveling ne at about the same speed as the international space station. it approached the moon and disappeared. i was willing to assume it was the iss.
then, another group appeared in the sw and followed the same ne path and disappeared near the moon, too. that eliminated the iss.
then a 3rd faint group appeared in about the same place in the sw, traveled near the moon, made a 270 degree turn to the west, went a short distance and disappeared. that really eliminated the iss.
what was interesting was the path of the groups. the path was not a perfectly straight line, it was a series of distinct course changes.
at least 40 people that were sitting by us saw and many commented on them.
there were probably 4000 people sitting on the field, facing south, all looking up in the sky for the first fireworks when these objects appeared.
expect more reports.
i am a pilot and used to flying at night - and they def weren't meteors, airplanes, satellites, fireworks.
content.summary: 3 groups of 6-10 blue points of light appeared traveling ne at high altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
Pulsation light that would blink and then blink in another spot and then blink at a 90�� angle from previous spot. blink again on same trajectory, and then again at 90�� angle. 
this went on for 10 to 15 seconds
content.summary: Pulsating light that moved and changed direction in perfect right angles

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on my back upper deck of my home with my panasonic lumix
dmz-fz8 camera to catch the forth of july fireworks that are shot over the bellingham bay.
before the fireworks began i noticed an orange object just appear(it looked like it was falling) in the sky above my head, and then it vanishes.
i have spotted the same craft on two other evenings but the pics came out
all squiggly before. this time i had my camera on a different setting and
i caught this group of photos as they passed over.
i must relate an unusual aspect of these objects; they briefly appear and
then seem to vanish as if they are slipping in and out of our dimension
if you will. it is hard to grasp the intensity of this event unless you
see the full group of at least 100 photos i took that night.
apparently these same objects have been seen from texas to canada all
heading from east to west.
i have been photographing ufo's for nearly 20 years; almost all seen in this current day are our own black budget projects i am sorry to say;
but i must say these objects travel in such an odd manner as if they are skipping in and out of our own dimension.
they appear and then disappear as they pass toward the west.
never before have these objects gotten directly overhead as they did on this evening. these shots are the perfect circles of varying colors.
as the fireworks were nearing an end. i photographed one of these craft
stopping and hovering near the fireworks display as if they were enjoying the show as well.
hopefully mufon will request all of my photos for analysis.
one photograph i took appears to show an actual physical craft.
i cannot wait for the analysis of this photo!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Fleet of orange ufo's seen travelling from east to west over bellingham,wa

content.detailedDescription:
Watching fireworks, ufo zipped around quickly then hovered. i have video.
multiple witnesses. videoed from 2nd story balcony on west shore across river from harrisburg pa. ufo appeared to be over the river super high up. we were only 1 block from river. everyone that witnessed agreed that what we saw was not a helicopter. ufo zipped around and changed colors a few times before i turned the camera on.
must look close high in the frame.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watching fireworks, ufo zipped around quickly then hovered. i have video.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i have seen craft over the years in the long beach island section of ocean county. some have been videotaped by others and featured on the news. but this most recent sighting occurred around mid-june, just a few weeks ago. it was twilight, and we were driving home along the main boulevard. he spotted it first- we could see it at the end of the street leading to the beach. we drove up the street and parked to observe. the craft was sort of rectangular, but more like an upside-down pie plate, except very thick. there were a series of white/pale yellow round lights all along the mid-section from nose to tail. i don't know if the lights were on the other side, but i assume they went around the craft. it was just before the summer season began- most of the houses (oceanfront and beach block) were empty and dark. this made the night sky even more brilliant because there were no street lights, lights from homes, cars, etc. there are no shops or businesses along the beach- there is no boardwalk. just beach and homes. 
we observed it for quite a while- it made a silent horizontal path, from south to north, then declined nose down at an angle near the shoreline. 
i wanted to get out of the car- but i had recent surgery and was walking with a cane and felt unsteady on the sand. 
had i been able to, i'd have flagged them down if i could! i would have gotten on board that craft so fast! eventually my husband wanted to drive home- it was just a mile away. i don't think he wanted to risk an encounter- had they seen us watching them. the craft was close- i'd say we were about 30 feet away. 
this isn't my first encounter. i was 15 when that happened- oddly- also near the beach, but a different city. a friend and i were "chased" by a craft that hovered at the height of the treetops on a clear night in the summer of 1964. it was shrouded by a cloud cover and the noise we heard was like nothing i had ever heard - to this day. like a thousand bells/gears turning at once, each having their own individual sound. we got away- we think. (my husband still thinks they got me an implanted something that programs me to make his life hell...) but i don't have any marks, scars, or missing time from that event, so i'm pretty sure we got away. we talk about it every once in a while- just to be sure we remember it correctly.
content.summary: Craft observed hovering, then gliding, over the beach near the shoreline.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my son sitting outside watching the night sky. apprx 10pm saw alarge blue ball size comparison equaled the moon flying from ne to sw. duration of sighting, apprx 4 sec on july 5 2014. object left a blue white trail.Did not disintigrate like a normal meteor. after about 4 seconds it just disappeared event was also witnessed by my neighbor. i was enthralled by sighting, i was a former pi investigator. so attention to detail was my main priority.
content.summary: Bright blue ball matching moon size streaked across sky blue/wht tail

content.detailedDescription: After fireworks and saw dome like object with a fire-like glow above planes.  thought it would hit us and it slowed, then went straight in very methodical way. no sound and looked directed in path.  very bright and almost looked like a fireball.  never trended down and was going for many miles and continued out of sight.
content.summary: Dome like object with a fire-like glow above planes - hovered and kept going.  no sound and looked directed in path

content.detailedDescription: I was light my last fireworks with my son in an open field in a residential area when i looked in the sky (northwest) i observed a glowing bright red object. it then started pulsating to orange and yellow in the middle. i pointed out the object to my son and we both was amazed at it as it seemed to  remain still. the lights then got dimmer and then it was gone. once it was completely gone, my son thought that maybe it was an airplane but i pointed out to him the planes that were in the sky. it sort of looked like a worm hole or something like a portal as it also appeared to be spiraling.
content.summary: While observing fireworks, observed bright red object in sky pulsating then orange-yellow in middle. object then vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
After a night of celebrating the 4th of july a group of us (5) were standing in the kitchen. two people went to leave the house. my cousin, first out the door said "look at that!"
4 of us ran out and stood on the back patio and stared in disbelief at an incredibly bright deep orange object slowly moving about the sky. 

what made this sighting so extreme enough for me to submit this report is that it was sooo obviously not a satellite. so obviously not a plane, helicopter, or firework. this thing had to have been huge as it was too far out to be a plane. it was not out of the atmosphere; not far enough out to be a vibrant satellite by any means. 

as we stood and watched as it hovered, i thought to myself "it probably knows we see it and will disappear."

within seconds, it moved due east a little bit. stopped. slowly moved southeast, then directly east. at this point is when the big orange globe went away and turned into a much smaller, much less vibrant deep deep red. as if a single light was on in the middle or something.
the red gave way to the huge orange globe again, and then 2 seconds later the red reappeared, and then nothing. it was gone.

all in a matter of 4 seconds, it turned red (the second time), it disappeared, i blinked and then i absolutely immediately realized i had an incredibly painful migraine. i felt dizzy and had some difficulty walking. it was at this time i told my friend i was sorry but had to go to bed. which i did.

there are a total of 4 witnesses. my best friend, my cousin and my uncle. it was the first ever ufo sighting for my uncle (a blue collar montana man) as well as my cousin (17). my friend and i  have been seeing a lot of strange activity in the skies over my back yard over the last couple of months. 
this is was the most intense and extreme sighting either of us have ever had. which is why i immediately started filling out this report form as i went to go to bed after the sighting. although, the migraine had grown so rapidly with such intensity i was asleep before i finished typing out my name.
  
the migraine may, or may not be related. the timing, however, is suspicious.

5 hours prior to the sighting, a small plane had gone back and forth across the sky.. may or may not be related. honestly, most likely a private plane trekking the skies to view the fireworks from above. 

also, a satellite did pass over the exact area this thing appeared approximately a half hour before the sighting. the satellite was moving due north.

last thing: what is most strange about the whole event is that we live less than 10 miles from the airport and are right alongside and directly under flight paths. there is a hospital less than a mile away with a very busy life flight. for 5 hours leading up to the sighting, except for the aforementioned small plane, and one commercial jet - absolutely zero planes passed overhead or near by. a commercial flight, most likely an allegient flight came overhead right around 9:30pm.

that was the last plane i heard or saw until the following day. normally a plane comes over the house, or over mount sentinel (due east) every half hour or so since there are direct flights to and from las vegas from the missoula airport. this lack of planes may have had to do with it being the 4th of july? fireworks and such.. i don't know. just trying to entertain all possibilities here.

best,
tommy evans
content.summary: Very bright and big orange moving object. changed direction. turned deep red twicethen seemed to shrink and disappear.

content.detailedDescription: I had came in from watching the fireworks display at bellevue park.I was watching t.V when my cousin called me outside to look at something. when i got outside and looked southwest i saw three red lights slightly pulsating in a triangular formation traveling northeast. the formation did not deviate and was constant. they moved swiftly and without any sound disappearing behind trees and houses. then a single red light followed probably 30 seconds later in the same flight path. the objects did not have any blinking aircraft lights. whats most interesting to me is that they moved without any "engine" noise and the triangular formation. i had tried to video it with my camera phone but it is hard to see.
content.summary: 3 red lights in formation with a single red light a minute later.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 9:00 pm on july 4, 2014, i was on my balcony (top floor) facing nw, looking at the ground lights of north central tucson, facing the catalina mountains which were several miles away.  the view is unobstructed.  the mountains raise several thousand feet above the valley floor.  it was a cloudy night with clouds above the mountains.
as i looked out i saw, against the mid-range to top of the mountains, a dim flash of light.  it reminded me of the blinking of fireflies i saw in my childhood.  intermittently there would be another - a very dim blink on and off, so fast it was like i didn't actually see it but was aware i had just seen it.  then i saw one or two streak across the mountain range, so quickly that it left a streaking trail across the panoramic view i was looking at.  my view encompasses about 5 miles from east to west (and vice versa) looking north.
then across the entire range, almost simultaneously, multiple flashes of bright blue/white lights flashed on and off across the entire range of mountains, at different heights.  i approximate perhaps 40 to 50 at once - it was like a light show of stars.  intermittently this would occur again, sometimes confined to a smaller area, sometimes across the entire panorama.  lights also continued, intermittently, to streak from one end to the other, in what seemed like a second or two, leaving a trail of light as they did.
i had never seen anything like this and i called my wife to come out to look.  
for a while nothing occurred and them it would begin again.  we both watched this for about 25-30 minutes.
at times the lights flashed on all across the mountains for 2-3 seconds before before extinguishing.  most times it seemed shorter than that.  all of this seemed to occur randomly, rather than regularly as a time sequence.
several times there were concurrent or singular streaking of two lights in tandem.
some lights appeared to have a reddish component.  my wife saw beams of red extend from those lights, and said some of the blue/white ones appeared to be dome-like.  i didn't see this because they flashed on and off so quickly that i couldn't focus like she can.
all of this was seen from a distance, and the flashes of light appeared more or less within the same general altitude.  they never streaked up into the sky, but remained constant against the backdrop of the santa catalina mountains. although much, much higher than any fireworks display.
there was no emotional reaction to any of this, rather just awareness of seeing something quite extraordinary, unlike anything we'd seen before.
i called 911 to ask if anyone had reported seeing something similar and was told that earlier that evening lights were reported seen at puch ridge, an area somewhat north and west that was not visible from my vantage point.  when i asked again if there were other sightings i was told that information could not be divulged. 
i would guess that during the course of the event, which lasted maybe 30-40 minutes, we saw in excess of a hundred such flashes of light, in different places, moving and stationary, flashing on and off, at different altitudes and for different length of time - but all for very short durations.
as far i can tell there have been no other reports at this time of contemporaneous similar sitings - but we know what we saw!
content.summary: 40 minutes of intermittent flashing streaking blue/white star-like lights, seemd like over 100

content.detailedDescription: my wife was sitting on our front porch, at approximately 9pm cst, talking on the telephone. i was sitting to her right, also on the porch. to the south i noticed a very bright red-orange object appear out from the tree-tops. i stepped off our porch to observe the object more clearly. suddenly the object made a very abrupt "streak" across the sky and just as abrupt "streak" back to its original position. almost immediately thereafter a second red-orange object appeared and began to align its movement with the first object. the first object i observed then disappeared but the second object was soon followed by a third red-orange object. i then alerted my wife of what i was seeing and went inside to get my children and my nephew. they all also witnessed the second and third objects. we all watched them until they disappeared, for a total of about 5 minutes. each of the objects appeared to be traveling in a south-to-southwest direction. these objects were soon followed by what appeared to be two helicopters traveling the same flight path as the three objects.
content.summary: Three red-orange

content.detailedDescription: My family and i went to see a local fireworks show in fairfax. it was around 9 pm when my mom pointed out an object a little above the horizon that seemed to be stationary. it seemed to be switching from a green light to a red light continuously. it could easily have been mistaken for a plane coming towards us, however the time between its pulses was slightly longer than a plane's. we decided to watch it. it was going towards the "left" then it came to a stop and as if it knew it was spotted, it made a dip and went behind the trees in the horizon. later last night, we saw the same object 2 more times. in all instances, it went behind something as if it knew it was being seen. also, it seemed to go towards the fireworks when the shows started. throughout the first round of fireworks, it was visible, and interestingly, it switched to flickering its lights from pulsating as if it was camouflaging itself. when the fireworks were not being used, it was only pulsating. the second object, or "light" we saw was a more white-cream color, and slightly bigger. it went towards the sky and we didn't see that one for a long duration.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo observation during 4th of july fireworks celebration.

content.detailedDescription: it was 4th of july and there were fireworks but this object was flying horizontally and pausing, hovering a couple times before it shot off. it is in a circular orange colored shape. i grabbed my phone to try and shoot video but ended up taking about 12 continual snap shots until it flew away.
content.summary: Horizontal flight pattern with hovering pauses. the color was orange in a curricular shape

content.detailedDescription: Smoking out in back yard with brother n saw object.......Scared confused surprised scared my 3 yr old son
content.summary: Saw a reddish orange orb or light in the sky disappear nthen reappear ten mins later and we think we saw planes chase after it

content.detailedDescription: Two of us were outside observing fireworks when i pointed and said "look... wait for it..." but the  what i thought was going to be a firework did not explode! instead it kept going up higher and higher until it just disappeared into the atmosphere. the bright orange glow did not fade until it just disappeared. when i tried to take a picture the glow area out and did not show up at all on camera. then i ran to tell my boyfriend and girlfriend and as i was telling them about 4 more came from different directions and they all did the same thing but went off into the west and way up till we could no longer see them anymore. some of my neighbors were walking their dog and i pounted them out to them as well so they to saw them!
content.summary: Small balls of light thought to be fireworks

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed 4 orange-red orb type objects moving in the same vector/trajectory that seemed to be over blairsville, ga moving in a nne direction. each orb followed each other clearing my line of sight over a mountain ridge by about 30 seconds apart. after roughly 15 seconds in view they blinked out. max i saw at one time was 2, other two were individual before they blinked out. i am constantly on my front porch and am well aware of helicopter traffic as well as commercial air liner traffic out of both atlanta and chattanooga, these were neither. closest thing it may of resembled was ariel flares, but there were no (and are hardly ever)fighter jets in the area. no sound.
content.summary: 4 orb orange-red event.

content.detailedDescription: My wife returned home from work and we went on the porch to have a cigarette.  looking over the treetops, i saw a bright orange/red sphere moving in a straight line north east, moving very fast.  the first thing i noticed was no sound.  i thought they might be an airplane, but there was no noise or blinking lights.  shortly thereafter, roughly 5-10 seconds, i saw a second object appear and travel along the same line.  after 30 seconds, a third object followed the same flight path.  i watched the 3rd until it disappeared.
content.summary: 3 bright red/orange spheres heading ne very fast

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in my car and resting my eyes. fireworks start going off and i notice a flame ball in the sky first thought was a firework of course, but did not disappear. stunned by the sighting i get out of my car and call my dad, but he didn't answer. called the home phone and he picks up i tell him come out quick. i was just outside so he came out and caught the last seconds of the glimpse. it appeared to be two fireballs on big one smaller. not symmetrical. just like the color of a camp fire. but very high in the sky.
content.summary: Flame ball too high to be a firework slowly disappeared while observation.
